name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_211Po
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Po" means the element "polonium" and "211Po" is the isotope "polonium-211" with a half-life of 6.03e-06 days.
